transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Namaste sir.
Executive: Namaskar.
Customer: Sir, main ye bol raha hun hamare liye aaj tak ek order bhi nahi aaya isme.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kis company se baat ho rahi hai sir?
Executive: Shivam Murti Art. Ji ji ji bataiye.
Customer: Shivam sir, main ji bol rahe hain kya?
Executive: Haan haan haan bataiye sir pehchan gaya bataiye.
Customer: Actually main call isliye us number pe maine. Sir aapne itna pareshan hun par main phone hi nahi kara maine ki abhi ye paise tumhare maine paisa lautane ki jaunga bas de dena to isme kuch bhi nahi aaya aaj tak.
Customer: Ab batao main kya karun?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Inquiry vagera kuch nahi aayi sir kyunki sir meri to baat ek do din pe ho jati hai inquiry vagera to aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ho jati hai sir inquiry se conversion ki agar baat karun sir to.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Par abhi tak sir koi bhi matlab jo bhi baat chit hui hai usme koi bhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi customer koi bhi kuch nahi kisi ne order nahi diya mere liye.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aaj tak ab kitne mahine ho gaye aap batao.
Executive: Haan time to lagbhag ho gaya hai sir aur maine by lead bhi share vagera karta hun.
Executive: Aaj bhi inhone to by lead uthaya hai sir Shahi Sweta Infra Private Limited koi aise karke hai unse baat hui hai kya?
Customer: Sir wo tarah tarah wo sahi kar dete hain isme aur dusri baat jo lead aati hai na wo consume ho jati hai. Hamare liye to kuch nahi hai hamara to piche bhagta hai mere se jitna to wo utha lete hain.
Customer: Isse sir unke liye bhejte ho aap aap special nahi bhejte hamare liye. Ab main itna pareshan hun maine bhai Sarvesh ji par aap kaise hi laga lo aap aapne humse kaise bhi chahe kuch bhi keh ke humne sidhe pad se jala diye paise hume pata nahi tha isme kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi koi baat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Humne kaha aaj hamara 40000 ka nuksan chala gaya.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aise dekho sir piche sir to aap hum.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye boliye boliye.
Customer: Main
Executive: Main bhi dekhiye sir main bhi aap haan haan price sir aapne diya sir to ye bhi nahi hai sir Sateesh sir ki main kahin ja raha hun sir ya fir main bol raha hun phone nahi utha raha aisa kuch nahi hai sir. Main bhi laga hun sir main bhi phone uthata hun.
Customer: Aapne dilaya tha isme order dilayenge aapke liye aapne vishwas dilaya tha.
Executive: Haan sir wo milega sir aisa nahi hai sir.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai ki sir IndiaMART pe order hi nahi hai sir aate hain sir lekin ye hota hai na kabhi kabhi baat bhi ek aad do logon se teen char logon se Shivam ji se hui hai but wo buyer hai sir conversion nahi hota hai kabhi kabhi ye thoda bahut to sab problem aa jati hai. Ab jaise Lakshmi Vishnu statue mein sir kal marble ka koi aapka tha Aligarh Uttar Pradesh se aapka unhone catalog view kiya tha kal ke date mein.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to wo by lead matlab consume nahi ho payi yahan pe kal hi ki date mein tha. To unse matlab shayad dekhe nahi honge ya jo bhi tha yesterday ke date mein show ho raha hai main unko lead jo hai Shivam ji ko send bhi kar dunga. To sir lead aayegi aisi koi baat nahi hai sir main bhi yahan pe laga hun Sateesh ji mera bhi ye nahi hai sir ki paisa le liya ya fir aisa kuch kar diya to matlab usme kuch response nahi milega ya fir ye kuch hai theek hai. Main bhi sir kaise bhi karke.
Customer: Mujhe response Sarvesh ji main to yahi request karunga aapse aapne vishwas dilaya to us vishwas ko ab hamare liye aap jamao ki haan ki Sateesh ji aaya ki nahi aaya. Aap dilaoge to hum karenge to hume bhi aapse vishwas juda rahega hamara vishwas bilkul nahi khatam hota ja raha hai.
Executive: Nahi wo to baat hai sir.
Executive: Nahi sir khatam nahi hoga aisa koi baat nahi hai sir theek hai abhi services sir bachi hui hai aisa nahi ki services puri khatam ho gayi hai sir. Ab mera sir Sateesh ji bata dun to mera sir jab bhi Shivam ji se baat hoti hai chahe main kuch bhi issue hota hai main sabse pehle priority deke Shivam jo marble Murti Art hai usme main sara cheez karta hun kaam vagera catalog vagera sahi karna by lead bhi share karta hun thoda conversion nahi nikal pa raha hai sir uske liye bhi sir tension mat lijiye main yahan pe cheez thoda sa baat karta hun theek hai ya fir mail vagera karta hun agar kuch ho jata hai to isme aur bhi main karaunga sir. Sir aisa nahi hai ki paise diye hain sir to matlab use nahi hoga 100% sir wahan pe aapko Sateesh ji benefit.
Customer: Haan jaise aapne Sarvesh ji hume to ye vishwas maine jis din se aapko batao aaj tak phone nahi kiya maine maine kaha nahi yaar ab humne sahi aapke sath kaam ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo to main bhi wo janta hun haan hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir uske liye mera bhi ye nahi hai sir ki main aisa nahi hun sir ki IndiaMART chalo baki sab ki tarah paisa le liya ya fir chala gaya ya fir phone nahi utha raha aisa nahi hai sir main bhi catalog ka aapke main hi account manager hun theek hai. To jo cheezein wahan pe hain wo aap aap hume dilao to main to aapse yahi request karunga ab mere paise lage aapne vishwas dilaya tha Sateesh ji aapke paas order aayenge.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aaj tak main imandari se keh raha hun main jhoot nahi bol raha chahe kuch bhi matlab ek bhi order nahi aaya ek bhi.
Executive: Haan ye conversion nahi hua sir main ye keh sakta hun na jaise order ka matlab inquiry to aa rahi hai thodi bahut baat bhi ho rahi hai Shivam ji se lekin convert nahi ho pa raha hai fir to uske regarding main ek baar fir se yahan pe ek baar mail karta hun team ko ki matlab kya issue aa raha hai theek hai kyunki jahan tak main dekh raha hun sara.
Customer: Ek baat batao aapko jaise ye stone hai wo hai jaane kya silver hai aur jaane kya mitti ka hai aur grass ka hai pata nahi ye aati hai hamare paas marble ki jaise koi bhi lead aati hai wo pehle hi uth jati hai pata nahi unke paas aap pehle bhejte ho ya hamare paas piche bhejte ho ye mere ko pata nahi hai hamare paas aati hai message bas hum turant dekhte hain to wo consume ho jati hai wo lead ek do aati hai bas wo bhi aapke mein aate jaate mein ek do.
Executive: Bas samajh raha hun sir aapko ye lag raha hoga ki by lead consume ho jati hai but sir wo main bata dun jaise IndiaMART pe koi bhi by lead buyer requirement post karta hai na to wo jitne buyer hain sab supplier hain sabke paas jata hai aisa nahi hai ki main kisi ko particular jyada hai usko de raha hun.
Customer: Pradeep marble ka aaj bhi kaam barkarar chal raha Pradeep marble ka sabse abbal kaam chal raha hai main keh raha hun aapka manager kaun hai jo aapko lead de raha hai unka manager koi aur hai to unka unka manager pata nahi kaise de raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm nahi unka manager dekhiye direct de raha usko direct de raha hai.
Executive: Nahi direct agar baat karun to aisa nahi hai agar main Bharatpur mein baat karun to sabse pehle jo top five mein Pradeep aate the na ab wo Pradeep nahi aate hain Bharatpur mein agar main baat karun to sabse pehle Vashisht Art collection uske baad apna Shivam Murti Art hi aata hai dusre number pe.
Customer: Dusre number pe chahta hai sir par company mein company to hai hamari sir us ladke ne kar karoke jaise matlab badhiya jagah pe la diye par usme hatho hai na aapko.
Executive: Haan to hai hi na.
Executive: Dekhiye haan usme Shivam ji ne achcha kiya hai pilot vagera consumption kiya hai listing vagera sara yahan pe mention top second number pe Bharatpur pe apni company hai koi issue nahi hai theek hai but isme thoda sa by lead conversion ke issue hai to ek baar main baat kar leta hun theek hai main unko discuss karke bata dunga Shivam ji ko dekhiye sir buyer apne paas jab aana chahiye sir buyer apne paas lagatar aa raha hai to conversion nahi hoga aaj nahi hoga kal to 100% hoga sir. Ye to hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aaj nahi wo pehle hi consume kar lete hain us lead ko humse uthti nahi okay aata hai.
Executive: Nahi wo ek do cases mein hota hai sir ki consume ho jata hai proper case mein aisa nahi hota ki by lead turant aake consume ho jati hai. Aisa hamesha case nahi hota hai.
Customer: Pata nahi fir kya system hai pata nahi hum to bahut pareshan hai sir aap hi dekh lo hamari taraf aapko wahi denge.
Executive: Main dekh leta hun sir aur sir kisi bhi company sir Bharat jo enterprises bata rahe hain na aap Bharat wale ka Pradeep ka jo bata rahe hain na aap Pradeep ka bhi sir jo account manager hamare IndiaMART se yahin pe baithe hain sir to aisa kuch hai nahi ki unko samne se lead dete hain aisa kuch nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi usme bahut order lagaye bahut order diye usse bahut order chale the uske.
Executive: Sir wo purani company unki hai sir uske baad fir wo website service use kar rahe hain to unko calls jyada aa rahe honge yahi isliye unka thoda sa.
Customer: Aap bolte hamare liye ki aap bada package lo sir humne to ye chota hi liya hume abhi chhote mein nahi milega to hum bada kahan se lenge.
Executive: Main aapko bada package kaise de dunga main to aapko bata raha hun na ki unka bada package hai main kaise bol dun ki aap 2 lakh ka package le lijiye main to aapse bolunga ki pehle aap jo use kare usko use kariye isme thoda sa aapko benefit hoga fir aap aage ko sochiye main ek hi baar aapse Sateesh ji bolunga ki 2 lakh ka package.
Customer: Aap pehle bata dete matlab thoda sa main thoda sa paisa aur laga deta isme par lead to aati isme customer to aate main paisa to kama sakta kam se kam.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi koi baat nahi hai theek hai main isko ek baar main sara cheez kar leta hun aur sir hope mat aisa kariye ki nahi aayega aayega sir 100% main isme thoda sa catalog vagera changes kar deta hun fir se aur main lagatar Shivam ji ko bhi by lead matlab yahan pe unko send karna start karwa deta hun sir aur unse boliye proper use kare sir ye aapko milega hi 100% aisa kuch nahi hai sir ek do bhi deal aapko karwa denge to wahan pe aap deal karwaoge matlab aap yahan se bhejoge jabhi to hum deal karenge.
Executive: Theek hai sir main unko whatsapp pe daily share karta hun aisi baat hai to sir koi dikkat nahi main unko whatsapp pe daily share kar dunga.
Customer: Haan sir maine isliye aapko aaj phone kiya hai maine aapse teen char mahine mein maine aapko call hi nahi kiya maine aapko.
Executive: Nahi wo to theek hai sir.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi koi baat nahi wo to already sir aapse bhi baat ho jayegi ya fir unse bhi baat ho jayegi wo do main jin number hai to wo to baat ho hi jati hai isme koi issue nahi hai theek hai but aisa nahi hai sir main baat karne mein sir piche nahi hatunga Sateesh ji isme sir aisi koi baat nahi hai service aapko bola hun sir ki aap lijiye aap liya sir to usko aapko benefit milega sir aur abhi time hai koi jyada issue nahi hai sir main ek baar baat karke discuss kar leta hun aapse regarding theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan sir aap main to ye keh raha hun aap hamari taraf socho kuch humne hum apna time pass haan haan main sir ek baar ek baar apni taraf se pura try kar leta hun sir theek hai koi dikkat nahi hoga sir abhi time hai sir aapko jo bhi matlab computer mein kuch bhi karna pade jo hamare liye aaye customer kuch bhi karo matlab haan aap usme jodo ya kuch bhi hai kaise karte hain aap ye to hume pata nahi hamare paas customer aane chahiye.
Customer: Aane ke baad haan jisliye hamare ko order mile sir hum yahi aapse request karenge aap jaldi se jaldi kuch karo.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main ek baar Shivam ji se baat kar lunga uske baad main by lead vagera pe direct share kar deta hun kal parso ka thoda portion kya hai kaise hai fir uske baad main unko bhejna start karwata hun theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai Sateesh ji main dekhta hun sir aap bilkul wo mat kariye sir main 100% apna dunga sir milke kaam karte hain koi dikkat nahi hoga theek hai main dekhta hun.
Customer: Ye aap jaise ab vishwas dila rahe ho aise hi vishwas dila nahi sir wo to main sir dilaunga sir kyunki sir aapko milega sir main janta hun na ki aapko milega sir kyunki main bhi kaam karta hun to mujhe pata hai ki by lead aati hai inquiry aata hai to usi ke main bhi bol raha hun bihaf pe ki nahi aapko milega sir aisi koi baat nahi hai main ek baar.
Customer: Nahi aati hai.
Customer: Haan nahi aati hai aapko maine bheja hai Shivam ji ko aisi koi baat nahi hai lekin thoda bahut kam aati hai thoda polytherin ka aati hai to wo main ek baar baat karke isko sahi karata hun theek hai aap update karata hun.
Customer: Isme wo sirf marble wali marble ki aani chahiye sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main ek baar dekh leta hun sir.
Customer: Chahe hamare group mein jod do koi whatsapp number jis group mein jod do.
Executive: Wo add kar diya hua hai add kar diya maine add kiya hai lead bhi jati hai kabhi kabhar main kal se daily unko send karata hun matlab proper way se theek hai.
Customer: Nahi whatsapp pe nahi aati hai hamare paas.
Executive: Maine jo Shivam ji ka number karke maine ek by lead ka group banaya hai na IndiaMART aur catalog team se hamara jo team hai us pe unko kabhi kabhi by lead jati hai ek do din ke antar se to main kal se daily send kara dunga haan whatsapp se usme aapka bhi number add kara deta hun theek hai to usme aapko daily by lead jo hai main share karaunga theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir namaskar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji namaskar.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any orders yet.

- Leads are being consumed before reaching customer.

- Feels misled into purchasing the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive assured customer of continued support.

- Executive will check on lead conversion issues.

- Executive will share leads daily on WhatsApp.

- Executive will discuss issues with Shivam Ji.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up with customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, orders, catalog
